## Return Value

Data containing a picture of this person

## Discussion

This method searches only the local file system and operates synchronously. To perform an asynchronous search or to search over a network, use [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPerson/beginLoadingImageData(for:)].

The returned data is in a QuickTime-compatible format. To create an image from it, use the `NSImage` method [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/init(data:)].

# imageData()

**Instance Method**

Returns data that contains a picture of this person.

## Declaration

```swift
func imageData() -> Data!
```

## Return Value

Data containing a picture of this person

## Discussion

This method searches only the local file system and operates synchronously. To perform an asynchronous search or to search over a network, use [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPerson/beginLoadingImageData(for:)].

The returned data is in a QuickTime-compatible format. To create an image from it, use the `NSImage` method [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/init(data:)].

## Managing Images

- **cancelLoadingImageData(forTag:)**: Cancels an asynchronous fetch of the images for a given tag.
- **beginLoadingImageData(for:)**: Starts an asynchronous fetch for image data in all locations
- **setImageData(_:)**: Sets the image for this person to the given data.
